titles.title: A bill to designate the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in West Palm Beach, Florida, as the "Thomas H. Corey VA Medical Center".
A bill to designate the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in West Palm Beach, Florida, as the "Thomas H. Corey VA Medical Center".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill designates the medical center of the Department of Veterans Affairs in West Palm Beach, Florida, as the Thomas H. Corey VA Medical Center.
